text: Hiruzen Sarutobi (猿 飛 ヒ ル ゼ ン, Sarutobi Hiruzen) is a fictional character from the the Naruto franchise. He was the Third Hokage. The Hokage is the leader of the village of Konohagakure. Sarutobi was a member of Konohagakure's Sarutobi clan. He was part of Team Tobirama, Other member included Homura Mitokado and Koharu Utatane. The team was led by the Second Hokage. In his youth, Sarutobi was the student of the first two Hokages, Hashirama and Tobirama Senju. After this, he was teacher of the three legendary Sannin; Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru. Sarutobi was resurrected by Orochimaru in the Fourth Shinobi World War. Category:Naruto characters
